name: part_003
file: tmp_hololive production x DreamHack Melbourne 2024： Down Under [Free Preview] [IQqAbuGvDHM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Informational waiting screen loop for the 'hololive production x DreamHack Melbourne 2024: Down Under' concert. The sequence includes photosensitivity warnings, recording/screenshot policies, performer penlight colors, and a 'starting soon' notice, repeating with different background music tracks.

subtitles.original:
PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: PLEASE BE AWARE OF
FLASHING LIGHTS THAT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT

FLASHING LIGHTS THAT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english:
Due to the nature of the performance,
please be aware of flashing lights.

subtitles.original:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS.
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.
subtitles.english:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS.
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.

subtitles.original:

Uploading screenshots to SNS is allowed.
Recording and unauthorized streaming are prohibited.
